protocols.name: Enterprise Deal Closing Process
protocols.description: Step-by-step guide for closing enterprise deals

steps.title: Initial Customer Contact
actions: Log opportunity in CRM within 24 hours
Send introduction email with company overview

steps.title: Discovery and Qualification
actions: Conduct discovery call using BANT framework
Document customer needs and pain points

steps.title: Solution Design
actions: Collaborate with Product team on requirements
Prepare pricing based on value delivered
Get internal approval for any custom features

steps.title: Proposal and Negotiation
actions: Address technical questions with Product team
Get Finance approval for final pricing

steps.title: Contract and Legal Review
actions: Use standard contract template if possible
Submit non-standard terms to Legal review
Address any legal concerns or redlines

steps.title: Close and Handoff
actions: Schedule kickoff call with Customer Success
Celebrate the win with the team!

success_tips: Maintain regular communication with all stakeholders
Involve specialists early in the process
Always confirm next steps at end of each interaction

protocols.name: New Employee Onboarding - Sales
protocols.description: First week checklist for new sales team members

steps.title: Day 1 - Orientation
actions: Meet with manager for role overview

steps.title: Day 2-3 - Product Training
actions: Review case studies and success stories

steps.title: Day 4-5 - Sales Process Training
actions: Shadow experienced sales rep on calls
